add((uint128,uint128,uint128),address).details: Add a distribution param for a lending pair

withdraw(uint256,address).details: user to withdraw accumulated rewards from a pool

CLAIM_REWARD_GRACE_PERIOD.details: grace period for user to claim rewards after endTimestamp

WITHDRAW_REWARD_GRACE_PERIOD.details: period for users to withdraw rewards after endTimestamp before it can be reclaimed by the guardian to prevent funds being locked in contract

activatePendingRewards().notice: activatePendingRewards Activate pending reward in the manger

endTimestamp().notice: end timestamp for distribution to end

massUpdatePools().notice: Update reward vairables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

pendingRewardActivation(uint256).notice: queue for receipt tokens awaiting activation

rewardToken().notice: reward token to be distributed to users

set(uint256,uint128,bool).notice: set update allocation point for a pool

startTimestamp().notice: start timestamp for distribution to begin

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.
